src_text: Go saenwa le go dumelelwa ga tumelelano ye go tla kaonafatša boikgafo bja Afrika Borwa mo lefaseng le mo kontinenteng mo go matlafatšeng lenaneo la taolo ya kontinente mo go ditšweletšwa tša maphelo.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho thakgolwa ha letsholo la OTM ka Moqebelo wa la 1 Mphalane 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Sishov’ingolovane: mmoho re aha moralo wa motheo wa dipalangwang ntlafatsang maphelo batho.”.

src_text: Pego ka ga Lenaneo la Tlhohleletšo ya Motšhelo la Phethagatšo ya Dinyakišišo le Tlhabollo (R&D) – 2019/20 le 2020/.
tgt_text: Lenaneo la selemo la OTM ke leo ka lona ho hlokomediswang setjhaba ka bohlokwa ba dipalangwang jwalo ka karolo ya kgolo le ntshetsopele ya moruo.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya Motšhelo la R&D Palamenteng mo mengwageng ye mebedi ya go feta (2019/20 le 2020/21).
tgt_text: Ho tla ba le diketsahalo tse fapafapaneng mefuteng yohle ya dipalangwang jwalo ka difofane, dikepe, dipalangwang tsa setjhaba ha mmoho le tsa mebila.

src_text: Se se sepelelana le karolo ya 11D (17) ya Molao wa Motšhelo wa Letseno, wa 1962 (Molao wa 58 wa 1962), woo nyakago go alwa ga dipego tše ka Palamenteng.
tgt_text: Diketsahalo tsena di tla hlokomedisa ka tshireletso le polokeho dipalangweng.

src_text: Lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya motšhelo le nyaka go hlohleletša dikhamphani tša praebete go beeletša mo go R&D gore go hlohleletšwe kgolo ya ekonomi, le go godiša katlego.
tgt_text: Bankakarolo ba tla bontshana le ka diphephetso tse tobaneng le lekala la dipalangwang..     Mmuso ntse ikemiseditse ka taba ya ho ntlafatsa meralo ya motheo ya dipalangwang, mahaeng le ditoropong ka sepheo sa ho bebofatsa ho thothwa ha batho le thepa..     Kopano ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) ya Lenaneo la ho Dudiswa ha Batho.

src_text: Kabinete thabela gore pego bontšha gore dikhamphani tše difsa di dirile kgopelo ya tlhohleletšo ya motšhelo hlohleletša dikhamphani tše dintši go hwetša setlamo se bjalo ka karolo ya go godiša dipeeletšo tša bona le go hlohleletša kgolo ya ekonomi.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha kopano ya UN-HABITAT Johannesburg ka la 16 le la 17 Mphalane.

src_text: Dikhamphani tše nne tša godimo tšeo di hweditšego tlhohleletšo ya motšhelo di ka makaleng tshepetšo ya ditšweletšwa tša temo; kaonafatšo ya meepo; dikhemikhale, dibotsefatši, dihlare le elektrotheknikhale le Theknolotši ya Tshedimošo tšeo Kabinete di dumeletšego bjalo ka dikarolo tše bohlokwa mo Leanong la Katlego ya Pholisi ya Intasteri.
Pego ka botlalo ka hwetšwa mo wepsaeteng ya Kgoro ya Saense le Kaonofatšo: www.dst.gov.za.
tgt_text: Lefapha la ho Dudiswa ha Setjhaba ke lona le tla tsamaisa seboka sena sa matsatsi mabedi seo ho sona ho tla tla boradipolotiki, basebeletsi le boradipatlisiso lekaleng lena ho kenyeletsa ditho tsa bohlokwa tseo tla beng le Kemedi ya UN-HABITAT ho tswa Nairobi, Kenya.

src_text: Foramo ya Molao wa Dibaka le Kgolo ya Afrika (AGOA) -.
tgt_text: Taba tla ba ka sehloohong mona tla ba ho nkuwa ha mehato mabapi le dibaka tsa baipehi le ba mekhukhung..     Sephetho sa dipuisano tsena tla ba ona mokotaba tla theha Moralo wa Matjhaba tla tliswa ho Kopano ya UN-HABITAT ho tla pasiswa ka     Ditshisinyo tsa Melao.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga Foramo ya AGOA ka.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Moifo wa Naha Shebaneng le Tlhekefetso tsa Basadi le Dipolao tsa Bona (GBVF) wa.

src_text: AGOA dumeletšwe ke Amerika (USA) ka 2000 go fa phihlelelo ya go ikgetha ya kgwebo ya go ikema go bontši bja dinaga tša Afrika tša Borwa bja Sahara le mebaraka ya gae ya USA.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa 2021 wa Moifo wa Naha Shebaneng le GBVF bakeng sa ho sekasekwa.

src_text: Dikišontle tša Afrika Borwa ka fase ga AGOA di akaretša dienywa tša go butšwa, dimake, dikoloi, didirišwa, tšhipi, setala le ditšweletšwa tša khemikhale.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena tla le moralo wa molao tla thusa ho theha komiti ya molao tla shebana le taba ya GBVF boetse dumella ho thehwa ha Boto tla tla le maano le ho kenya tshebetsong ha Leano la Moralo wa Naha shebaneng le GBVF le neng le tjhaelwe monwana ke Kabinete ka Mphalane.

src_text: Tšatšikgwedi la nnete le lefelo di sa tlo tsebišwa.
tgt_text: Boto ena tla ba le kemedi ya persente tse 51 ho tswa setjhabeng le tse 49 ho tswa mmusong.

src_text: Samiti ya Ditona ya Sehlopha sa Ditlhahlobo tša Lefase (GEO) –.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao se phatlaladitswe bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba..     Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Kwae le Disebediswa tsa ho Tsuba tsa Elektroniki wa.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore Afrika Borwa sware Samiti ya Ditona ya GEO ka Motsekapa ka.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Kwae le Disebediswa tsa ho Tsuba tsa Elektroniki wa 2018 Palamenteng oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng hore kene sebakeng sa Molao Laolang Kwae wa 1993 (Molao wa bo 83 wa 1993) jwalo ka ha ntlafaditswe..     Ka tshisinyo ena ho ikemiseditswe ho tiisa melawana ya dipetlele tsa mmuso hore ikamahanye le ya Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Bophelo bo Botle Laolang Kwae nngwe ya dintho tse bolelwang ke tshisinyo ena ke dibaka tseo ho sa tsubelweng ho tsona kantle le ka hara meaho; ho kwalwa ha ho rekiswa ha kwae metjhining ya ho rekisa, le hore kwae be le letshwao la tlhokomediso pakaneng ya yona..     Tshisinyo ena sekasikilwe ke bankakarolo bohle ho kenyeletsa indasteri ya kwae, mekgatlo ya setjhaba ha mmoho le mafapha amehang mmuso     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.

src_text: GEO ke mokgatlo wa mebušo ya boditšhabatšhaba woo hlomilwego ka 2003 ka morago ga Samiti ya Lefase ya Tlhabollo ya go Swarelela šoma bjalo ka sefala sa kopano moo dinaga di kgathago tema ka go ithaopa go fihlelela nepo ya go swana ya go aga mananeo GEO.
tgt_text: Kopano Tlwaelehileng ya bo 77 ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UNGA77).

src_text: Gonabjale GEO na le mebušo ya bosetšhaba ya go feta 113, ye 30 ya yona tšwago ka Afrika gomme mekgatlo ye ka bago 140 kgatha tema, gomme ye 11 ya yona tšwa Afrika.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa nka karolo ho UNGA77 tswelang pele ntlokgolo ya Matjhaba Kopaneng mane New York City, USA ho tloha ka la 20 ho isa ho la 27 Loetse 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Nako ya bohlokwa: Tharollo ya diphetoho mathateng rarahaneng”.

src_text: Afrika Borwa dutše le leloko la Komitiphethiši go tloga ka 2005 gomme boramahlale ba rena gonabjale ba kgatha tema mananeong dinyakišišo mmalwa ao etilwego pele ke GEO.
tgt_text: Kgahlamelo ya sewa sa Khorona (COVID-19) dinaheng tseo moruo le bodulo ba teng bo seng maemong bile kgolo ha bapiswa le ya dinaha tse setletseng mme dinaha tsena ha di tlameha ho tlohelwa di sale morao ha re tla tabeng ya kahobotjha le tsoseletso..     Pele ho Ngangisano ya Kopanong eo ya UN, Mongodi Moholo wa UN, Ntate António Guterres tla kopanya seboka se mabapi le “Diphetoho ho tsa Thuto” mme bitse le kopano ya bohlokwa ya Maano Ntshetsopele (di-SDG).

src_text: Kgwedi ya Dinamelwa ya Diphalane (OTM) –.
tgt_text: Dikopano tsena tsa di-SDG ho lebeletswe hore di tle le ditsela tsa ho potlakisa ho kengwa tshebebetsong ha maano..     Letsatsi la Botjhaba.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go thakgolwa ga lesolo la OTM ka Mokibelo, 1 Diphalane 2022, ka fase ga morero: “Sishov’ingolovane: mmogo re aga infrastraktšha ya dinamelwa yeo agago mešomo ya go swarelela”.
tgt_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fana ka puo ya bohlokwa moketeng wa ho keteka Letsatsi la Botjhaba la 2022 mane Union Buildings ka Moqebelo wa la 24 Loetse.

src_text: OTM ya ngwaga le ngwaga šomišwa go godiša temošo ka dinamelwa bjalo ka dikarolo tše bohlokwa mo kgolong ya ekonomi le tlhabollo ya mahlakore mararo.
tgt_text: Lepetjo la mokete ona ke le reng: “Re Hopola Lefa la Solomon Linda re Thabela le Mmino wa Setso sa Afrika Borwa.”.

src_text: Go tla ba le ditiragalo tše mmalwa go bontšha dikarolo tše mmalwa tša infrastraktšha ya dinamelwa ka go difofane, dikepe, dinamelwa tša bohle le ditsela.
tgt_text: Selemong sena Kgwedi ena ya Botjhaba tla tsepamisa maikutlo mminong wa setso sa Afrika Borwa haholoholo wa Isicathamiya ha mmoho le kabelo ya ona dipapading, tsa bonono, tsa setso le botjhaba.

src_text: Ditiragalo di lemoša gape ka polokego le tšhireletšo ya dinamelwa.
tgt_text: Ka lepetjo lena ho ikemiseditswe ho keteka dilemo tse 60 sebini le moqapi wa dipina Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962) hlokahetse mme boela tsebisahale ka la Solomon Ntsele, eo leng moqapi wa pina ya, “Mbube”.

src_text: Go tla akaretšwa gape bakgathatema go boledišana ka ditlhohlo tša go fapana mo lekaleng la dinamelwa.
tgt_text: Mokete wa Matjhaba wa 2022 wa Letsatsi la Ditaba tsa Mawatle.

src_text: Mmušo dula ikgafile mo go kaonafatšeng infrastraktšha ya dinamelwa ya naga, bobedi mo mafelong segae le setoropong, gore go sepetšwe tshepelo ye botse gape ya bokgoni ya dithoto le batho.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa tla keteka Mokete wa Matjhaba wa 2022 wa Letsatsi la Ditaba tsa Mawatle mane Thekong ho tloha ka la 12 ho isa ka la 14 Mphalane.

src_text: Kopano ya Lenaneo la Magae la Bodulo bja Batho (UN-HABITAT) la Kopanoditšhaba (UN).
tgt_text: Mokete ona tla tshwarwa nakong ya OTM moo ka lona ho tlang ho etswa tlhokomediso ka dikepe jwalo ka lekala la dipalangwang.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga kopano ya maloko UN-HABITAT ka Johannesburg ka la 16 Diphalane..  Kgoro ya Bodulo bja Batho tla sepetša kopano ye ya matšatši mabedi yeo tla tsenelwago ke ditsebi tša dipolotiki, ditsebi le banyakišiši, go akaretša malokomagolo Komiti ya go ya go ile ya Baemedi ba UN-HABITAT bao ba lego Nairobi, Kenya.
tgt_text: Moketeng ona ho tla ba teng le kemedi ho tswa dinaheng tse fapafapaneng ho tla iponela tsa indasteri ya dikepe ya Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Ditaba tše bohlokwa tšeo go tla bolelwago ka tšona di tla akaretša ditsenogare tša phetogo go badudi ba mekhukhung le metsesetoropo go tlala kudu.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho sa Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Dikepe ho tloha ka selemo sa.

src_text: Dipoelo tša dipoledišano tše di tla phethwa mo thakgolong ya Tlhako ya Leano la Katlego la Lefase, yeo tla alwago Kopanong ya UN-HABITAT gore dumelelwe ka  Melaokakanywa.
tgt_text: Mokgatlo ona ke lekala le laolang tshebetso ya dikepe ho Matjhaba Kopaneng..     Kgwedi ya Bohahlaudi.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wa Khansele ya Setšhaba ya Dikgaruru tša Bong le Dipolao tša Basadi le Bana (GBVF) wa.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Bohahlaudi (27 Loetse) Kgweding ena ya Bohahlaudi re tlo le keteka ka lepetjo le reng, “Re Nahana Botjha ka Bohahlaudi”.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wa Khansele ya Setšhaba ya 2021 Palamenteng gore go šoganwe le wona.
tgt_text: Tsa bohahlaudi kwano lapeng di bohlokwa bakeng sa kahobotjha ya lekala lena la bohahlaudi le karolo kgolo ya Lekeno la Afrika Borwa ha mmoho le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi..     Kabinete thabetse ho ntlafala ha lekala la kamohelo ya baeti le ntlafetseng ka mora sewa sa COVID-.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo fa tlhako ya molao mo go hlongweng ga mokgatlo wa molao gore go be le tsenogare ye nepišago mo go šoganeng le GBVF dumelela gape go thongwa ga Boto ya Khansele yeo tla fago taolo yeo beakantšwego gomme ya laola phethagatšo ya Leano la Taolo ya Setšhaba ka ga GBVF, leo le dumeletšwego ke Kabinete ka Diphalane 2020 go phethagatšwa.
tgt_text: Halofong ya pele ya 2022, ho bile le maeto lehae dimilione di.

src_text: Boto tla le kemedi ya 51 go tšwa go setšhaba sa gae le 49% go tšwa mmušong.
tgt_text: 2 leng keketseho ya persente tse 114 ha ho bapiswa le nako tshwanang selemong sa.

src_text: Molaokakanywa šetše swayaswayilwe ke setšhaba.
tgt_text: Sena se bontsha keketseho leha ho bapiswa le nako tshwanang ka selemo sa 2019 moo ho bileng le maeto lehae dimilione di.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wa Ditšweletšwa tša Motšoko le Didirišwa tša go Kgoga Motšoko tša Elektroniki wa.
tgt_text: Jwalo ka karolo ya ho keteka Kgwedi ya Bohlaudi, Kabinete kgothaletsa Maafrika Borwa hore etele diprofensi tsa bona ka ho fapana..     Kabinete amohetse qeto ya Bofofise ba Belgium ba ho ba le difofane tse tlang Afrika Borwa ka ho otloloha ho qalang kgweding ena (Loetse) leng se tla matlafatsa lekala lena le ho netefatsa taba ya hore Afrika Borwa ke sebaka se setle sa bohahlaudi.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa palamenteng Ditshwayotshwayo tša Molaokakanywa wa Ditšweletšwa tša Motšoko le Didirišwa tša go Kgoga Motšoko tša Elektroniki wa 2018, tšeo di nyakago go phumola Molao wa gonabjale wa go Laola Ditšweletšwa tša Motšoko, (Molao wa 83 wa 1993) go ya le ka moo mpshafaditšwego ka gona.
tgt_text: Sena se tla kenyeletsa difofane tse tla ya Kapa le Johannesburg jwalo ka beke     Melaetsa.

src_text: Molaokakanywa nyaka go matlafatša magato maphelo setšhaba naga gomme dire gore sepelelane le Tumelelano ya Tlhako ya Mokgatlo wa Maphelo Lefase ka ga Taolo ya Motšoko.
tgt_text: Diteboho    Kabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: Mopresidente William Samoei Ruto wa Kenya, ya neng behwa semmuso ka Labobedi la la 13 Loetse 2022, ho latela dikgetho tse se nang morusu tse neng di tshwerwe ka la 9 Phato.

src_text: Molaokakanywa šišinya gare ga tše dingwe, gore go se sa folelwa ka gare ga meago le mafelo mangwe ka ntle ga meago; go fedišwa ga thekišo ya sekerete mo metšheneng ya go rekiša, le go thekga taba ya diphuthelwana tša disekerete le maswao temošo.
tgt_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente, Ntate David Mabuza ne le teng moketeng oo ho emela Mopresidente Ramaphosa, mmuso le setjhaba sa Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Molaokakanywa fetišitšwe dikgatong tša go tsenelela tša go nyaka maikutlo setšhaba go fapana, go akaretša intasteri ya metšoko mekgatlo ya badudi le dikgoro tša mmušo tša maleba  Ditiragalo tše di Tlago.
tgt_text: Mokgatlo wa Afrika Borwa wa Rabi ha mmoho le Toropo ya Kapa ka ho tshwara ka katleho Mohope wa Lefatshe wa borobedi wa Rugby Sevens ho tloha ka la 9 ho isa ka la 11 Loetse ne le lekgetlo la pele tonamente ena tshwarelwa Afrika, mme seo se bontsha hantle hore Afrika Borwa tumme hantle ka kamohelo ya baeti..     Matshediso     Kabinete fetisetsa matshediso yona ho malapa le metswalle ya:  Bana ba sekolo ba 18 le batho ba baholo ba babedi ba ileng ba hlokahala kotsing nyarosang ka Labohlano la la 16 Loetse mane Phongola, KwaZulu-Natal ka mora hore lori thulane le vene tsamaisang bana ba sekolo     Kgiro.

src_text: Kopano ya bo 77 ya Kopanokakaretšo ya UN (UNGA77).
tgt_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang     Ntate Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale jwalo ka Molaodi Kakaretso (DG): Mokomeshenara wa Naha wa Lefapha la Tlhabollo ya Batshwaruwa     Ngaka Malixole Percival Mahlati Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso DDG: Ya Karolong sebetsang ka Dipetlele le Thuto Phahameng ho tsa Bophelo bo Botle le Ntshetsopele ya Ditaba tsa Basebetsi Lefapheng la tsa Bophelo     Ntate Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki jwalo ka Moabi wa Lefatshe ya ka Sehloohong Lefapheng la tsa Temo, Ntlafatso ya tsa Mobu le ho Ntlafatswa ha Dibaka tsa Mahaeng     Ntate Phaswa Phineas Mamogale Motsamaisi ya ka Sehloohong wa Ditjhelete Lefapheng la tsa Bophelo..     Kabinete dumellana le ho hirwa ha batho ba latelang     Ntate Tshediso Matona jwalo ka Mokomeshenara wa Komeshene ya Tshehetso ya ba Batsho Moruong (BBBEE)     Ditho tsa Boto ya Maipiletso ya Difilimi le Diphatlalatso: Ntate Siyazi Tyamtyam (Modulasetulo); Mme Sohani Natasha Chundhur;Mme Sisanda Nkoala;Mme Shandukani Mulaudzi;Mme Nomaswazi Rachel Shabangu-Mndawe;Ngaka Litheko Modisane;Mme Phuti Nehemia Phukubje;Mme James Shikwambana; leMme Manko Thalitha Bufffel kgethilwe hape).

src_text: Tšhireletšego ya Meetse.
tgt_text: Paballo ya Metsi.

src_text: Kabinete lebogile MaAfrika Borwa ka moka ge ba obametše taelo ya go fokotšwa ga meetse ye phethagaditšwego dikarolong tše dingwe tša Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni go boetša sekeng maemo matamo.
tgt_text: Kabinete leboha Maafrika Borwa ka ho ikobela dipehelo mabapi le ho fokotswa ha phepelo ya metsi dikarolong tse itseng tsa Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni ka boiteko ba ho imolla mehlodi ya rona.

src_text: Matamo ka mehutahuta ka fase ga kgatelelo ye kgolo kudu ka baka la dithemphereitšha tša go fiša tšhiritšhiri gola Gauteng, ebile nyakego ye golelago godimo ya meetse gapeleditše Rand Water go fokotša ka bontši meetse ao abelwago mebasepala.
tgt_text: Mehlodi le matamo rona tlasa kgatello kgolo ka lebaka la maemo motjheso phahameng Gauteng leng se qobelletseng ba ha Rand Water ho fokotsa phepelo ya bona ya metsi ho bommasepala bana.

src_text: Rand Water aba meetse go nwega mantši bathong ba go feta 11 milione go la Gauteng, dikarolong tše dingwe tša Mpumalanga, Freistata le Leboa Bodikela.
tgt_text: Khamphane ena ya metsi fepela batho ba fetang dimilione tse 11 Gauteng le karolong tse ding tsa Mpumalanga, Foreisitata le Leboya Bophirima..   Ho fokotswa hona ha phepelo ka hona ho ikemiseditswe ho leka ho baballa metsi ho fihlela maemo ntlafala.

src_text: Tšona diphokotšo tše tša go se efogege di nepile go boloka kabo ya meetse ebile di tla dula di le gona go ba go fihlela ge seemo se kaonafala.
tgt_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba hore se tswele pele ho ikobela dipehelo tsa ho fokotswa hona ha phepelo ya metsi ka hore se sebedise ka nepo..   Seteraeke sa ha Transnet.

src_text: Kabinete dirile boipiletšo setšhabeng go tšwelapele go obamela magato phokotšo ya meetse le go kgatha tema ya bona ka go šomiša ka tshwanelo ka ge le sedirišwa sa go hlokwa kudu.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse tumellano ya nyollelo ya meputso ya dilemo tse tharo fihletsweng ke mokgatlo wa basebetsi wa United National Transport Union (UNTU), le Transnet tla qala morao ho tloha ka la 1 Mmesa 2022 ho fihlela ka la 31 Tlhakubele.

src_text: Mogwanto wa Transnet.
tgt_text: Komeshene ya Tharollo ya Ditaba tsa Basebetsi (CCMA) ke yona neng laola dipuisano tsena mme sena se tlisitse mohwanto ona wa ditho tsa UNTU pheletsong hanghang.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše kwano ya meputso ya mengwaga ye meraro ye kwanetšwego ke Transnet le Yunione ya Mohlakanelwa ya Bosetšhaba ya Dinamelwa (UNTU), ye tlo dirišwago pakeng ya 1 Moranang 2022 go fihla ka la 31 Hlakola.
tgt_text: Kabinete boetse ya amohela kgoeletso ya mokgatlo wa basebetsi wa South African Transport and Allied Workers Union wa ho fedisa seteraeke sa bona..   Kabinete amohela hape boinehelo ba Transnet ba ho shebana le mosebetsi wa ho leka ho fokotsa mosebetsi saletseng morao boemakepeng le ditereneng tse tsamaisang thepa bakilweng ke seteraeke sena leng se ammeng moruo wa naha le bohle ba tshepetseng tshebeletsong ya Transnet..   Kabinete leboha tshehetso le tshebedisano mmoho bontshitsweng ke dikgwebo nakong ena ya seteraeke.

src_text: Khomišene ya Poelano, Bonamodi le Ditherišano namotše kwano ye, gomme magato bona dirile gore boipelaetšo ka maloko UNTU bo fedišwe ka ponyo ya leihlo.
tgt_text: Kabinete kgothaletsa taba ya hore dikamano tsena di tswele pele pakeng tsa Transnete le mekgatlo ya basebetsi molemong wa khamphane le moruo wa naha..   Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le naha ya Saudi Arabia.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše gape sephetho sa go fediša mogwanto ka Yunione ya Dinamelwa ya Afrika Borwa le ya Bašomi.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse ketelo bileng le katleho ya Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa naheng ya Saudi Arabia ka la 15 le la 16 Mphalane.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše boikgafo bja Transnet bja go bea šedi godimo ga go fediša ditšhalelomorago tše bilego gona go ralala boemakepe le dipeakanyong tša ditimela nakong ya magato boipelaetšo, ao bilego le seabe se se mpe ikonoming le makaleng ao tshepetšego godimo ga Transnet go aba ditirelo..   Kabinete bontšhitše tebogo ya yona godimo ga thekgo le tšhomišanommogo ye laeditšwego ke dikgwebo ka nako ya mogwanto hlohleletša kamano ye sa felego magareng ga balaodi ba Transnet le bašomi gore khamphani ye le ikonomi ya naga ka bophara di holege.
tgt_text: Ketelong ena dinaha tsena tse pedi di ile tsa saena ditumellano tse 17 makaleng mangata kenyeletsang la temo, botshwasi ba dihlapi, la merafo, ho fehlwa ha motlakase ka tsela ya tlhaho, tsa tshireletso, dipalangwang le la tlhahiso ya dimela le diphoofolo tsa lewatleng.

src_text: Dikamano tša Afrika Borwa le Saudi Arabia.
tgt_text: Ho boetswe ha saenwa le ditumellano tsa ho thehwa ha Moifo wa tsa Kgwebo le tshebedisano ho tsa sesole le theko ya thepa ya mmuso ha mmoho le tsa tlhahlobo ya maemo lefatshe..   Mopresidente sebedisitse monyetla ona ho mema ba tsa kgwebo Saudi Arabia ho tla sebokeng sa bohlano sa matsete sa Afrika Borwa se tla ba isao ka.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše Ketelo ya Mošomo ye atlegilego ya go ya kua the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia ka Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka la 15 le 16 Diphalane.
tgt_text: Saudi Arabia ke naha ya bobedi ka boholo hwebelanang le Afrika Borwa dinaheng tsa Botjhabela ba Bohareng mme hape ke naha eo ho yona ho rekwang thepa ngata tikolohong ena.

src_text: Nakong ya keteko ye, dinaga tše ka bobedi di saenetše Dimemorantamo tše 17 tša Kwešišano go magoro go fapafapana go swana le temo, boreatlhapi, meepo, enetši ya go mpšhafatšega, tšhireletšego, dinamelwa le temo ya diphedi le dimela tša ka meetseng.
tgt_text: Dikamano tsa dinaha tsena di tlisitse tshebedisano ntle ho tsa kgwebo le matsete..   Matsete Meralo ya Motheo.

src_text: Dimemorantamo tše dingwe tša kwešišano tšeo di saenetšwego ke tša mabapi le go hlongwa ga Khansele ya Mohlakanelwa ya Dikgwebo, tšhomišano legorong la diintasteri tša sešole le dithekišetšano, tšhomišano ya ditekolonyakišišo tša thutaswika.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohela taba ya ho simollwa ha sitsi sa tlhahiso sa dihlahiswa tsa polasitiki sa maemo pele mane Lanseria Gauteng ke khamphane ya matjhaba ya ALPLA Group.

src_text: Mopresidente šomišitše ketelo ye go mema dikgwebo tša Saudi Arabia go iponagatša khonferenseng ya bohlano ya dipeeletšo ya Afrika Borwa ye tlo swarwago ka.
tgt_text: Sena se paka boinehelo ba Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba ho ntshetsa meralo ya motheo pele jwalo ka mokgwa wa ho nyolla moruo le menyetla ya mosebetsi..   Sena ke projeke ya matsete bitsang tjhelete dimilione di 50 tsa ditollara tsa Amerika mme ke karolo ya projeke ya moralo wa Toropo sebedisang Marangrang ya Lanseria.

src_text: Saudi Arabia ke mogwebišani wa bobedi wo mogologolo wa Afrika Borwa seleteng sa Bohlabelagare ebile ke mothopo wo mogologolo wa diromelwa ka nageng go tšwa go sona selete se.
tgt_text: Projeke ena tla hlahisa botsitso moruong thehe le mesebetsi ka bang.

src_text: Dikamano tša boditšhabatšhaba magareng ga dinaga tše ka bobedi di bile le ditlamorago tše botse godimo ga ditlwaedi tša kgwebišano le dipeeletšo.
tgt_text: Projeke ena kenyeletsa le mananeo 36 thupello ya boratekginiki ho tsa motlakase le ho lokiswa ha metjhini mmoho le ho tsoselletswa botjha ha dintho tse lahlilweng.

src_text: Dipeeletšo tša Mananeokgoparara.
tgt_text: Ba rupelletsweng lenaneong lena ba tla sebetsa ho ALPLA Group dinaheng tsohle tse Afrika ka borwa.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše go thongwa ga polante ya tšweletšo ya plastiki ya maemo godimodimo lefaseng ka khampani ya go dira plastiki yeo tšwago pele maemong boditšhabatšhaba, ya go bitšwa ALPLA Group, go la Lanseria kua Gauteng.
tgt_text: Lenaneo lena la thupello le tla qala ka 2023 mme ba 12 ba pele ho tla rupellwa ba tla kgethwa hona mona setjhabeng..   Ho Rashwa Ntle le Molao.

src_text: Se se tlaleletša maikgafo Mopresidente Ramaphosa go bea sekeng tlhabollo ya mananeokgoparara bjalo ka mokgwa wa go hlohleletša kgolo ya ikonomi le go atiša mešomo..   Dipeeletšo tša boleng bja US$50 milione di kgatha tema ye kgolo godimo ga Leanolegolo la Toropo ya Mabonwa ya Lanseria leo le tlo hlohleletšago seemo seo se tieletšego le tšhomišoleswa le gape go hlola le go šireletša mešomo ye.
tgt_text: Ho rashwa ntle le molao ho lematsa setjhaba le moruo wa rona.

src_text: Godimo ga dipeeletšo tše go akaretšwa le lenaneo la go ithutela mošomo la batsebi ba 36 ba bointšineere bja dikgerekgere le ba tšhomišogape ba ditiro tša ALPLA Group go ralala selete sa Borwa bja Afrika.
tgt_text: Sena se tlisa tahlehelo ya lekeno mmusong le lekaleng la merafo..   Kabinete thabetse ho hatjwa ha dithunya le ho tshwarwa ha babelaellwa ba 20 ba belaellwang ketsong tsena tsa ho rafa ntle le molao mane Stillfontein Leboya Bophirima..   Kabinete etsa boipiletso ho mekgatlo qobellang melao ho netefatsa hore matsholo bona a atleha.

src_text: Lenaneo le la boithutelamošomo le tlo thoma ka 2023, ka baithutelamošomo ba mathomo ba 12 ba MaAfrika Borwa ba go tšwa mafelong ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Sena se tla romela molaetsa pakang hore tlolo tsa molao ha di na molemo, dinokwane di tshwarwa di kwallwe ntle le tshabo..   Motlakase.

src_text: Meepo ye Sego Molaong.
tgt_text: Eskom sa tswa saena tumellano ya dilemo tse 30 le bahlahisi ba ikemetseng ba tla fehla motlakase seteisheneng sa Majuba le sa Tutuka mane Mpumalanga.

src_text: Meepo ye sego molaong kweša setšhaba bohloko le go gobatša ikonomi ya gaborena, ebile dipoelo tša yona ke tobo ya letseno go bobedi mmušo le lefapha la meepo..   Kabinete amogetše go amogwa ga dithunya tšeo di bego di utilwe le go golegwa ga bagononelwa ba 20 ba go amana le meepo ye sego molaong ka nako ya lesolophuruphutšo kua mokoting wa moepo wa Stilfontein go la Leboa Bodikela.
tgt_text: Kgiro ya lefatshe leo ho tlo ahwa diteishene tsena ho lona le tla tlisa matsete ballwang ho dibilione tse 40 tsa diranta..   Dikhamphane tse nne tse tla fehla motlakase ona ke – HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group le Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – mme di tla eketsa motlakase wa 2 000 megawatts phepelong ya naha.

src_text: Kabinete dira boipiletšo go MaAfrika Borwa go tšwelapele go šomišana le mabotho phethagatšo ya molao go netefatša go atlega ga masolo kamoso twantšho ya bosenyi.
tgt_text: Motlakase ona tla hokelwa phepelong ya naha dikgweding tse 24 ho isa ho tse 36 ka mora ho phethelwa ha ditlhoko tse hlokahalang tsa ditjhelete mmoho le ditumello tse mabapi le tshebediso ya mobu..   Paballo ya Tlhahiso ya Dijo.

src_text: Se se tla romela molaetša wo bogale wa gore bosenyi ga bo thuše ka selo, le gore badirabosenyi ba tlo golegwa le go sekišwa ntle poifo goba go šokelwa..  Enetši.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohela ho tshwarwa ha seboka sa Agri SA sa 2022 mane Tshwane ka la 13 le 14 Mphalane 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re Hlahisa tsa Lehae”.

src_text: Eskom saenetše dikwanelo tša go hiriša tša mengwaga ye 30 gotee le babeeletši ba bane ba batšweletši ba go ikema ba mohlagase go aga metšhene ye mefsa ya go fehla enetši ya go hlweka kua ditišing tša mohlagase tša Majuba le Tutuka gola Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Sebokeng sena ho sekasekilwe taba tse kenyeletsang moralo bakeng sa tlhahiso ya lehae, meralo ya motheo bakeng sa bahlahisi ba lehae; ho etsa tikoloho ya rona dumelle tlhahiso ya dijo bakeng sa nako tlang ha mmoho le ho thusa bahlahisi ba lehae tshebetsong ya bona ya ho hlahisa dijo kwano..   Bakeng sa paballo ya nako tlang ya tlhahiso ya dijo, Kabinete amohetse ho thehwa ha Sitsi sa Naha sa Thibelo ya Ditshwaetso tse amang Leruo le Dijalo.

src_text: Khirišo ye ya seripa sa naga tla goketša dipeeletšo tše phopholeditšwego tša go batamela R40 bilione.
tgt_text: Sena se etswa ke Lekala la Mahlale tsa Temo Lefapheng la Saense le Mahlale ka kopanelo le Yunivesithi ya Tshwane.

src_text: Babeeletši ba ba bane – HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Solar Group le Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – ba tlo fehla mohlagase wa go lekana dimekawate tše 2 000 godimo ga mohlagase wa go tšweletšwa setšhabeng.
tgt_text: Sitsi sena se tla thusa thibelong le ho fokotseng ditshwaetso tsa dijalo le diphoofolo leng se tla tshehetsa tlhahiso ya dijo le ntshetsopele ya dibaka tsa mahaeng   Diqeto tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Phehlo ye ye mpsha ya mohlagase go letetšwe gore kgokaganywe le mohlagase wo tšweletšwago nageng ka bophara mo dikgweding tše 24 go fihla go tše 36 go tloga ge ngwaga wo wa ditšhelete fela, ka go latela ditumelelo tša tikologo, tša karolo ya mafelo le tše dingwe tša taolo.
tgt_text: Ho Lokiswa ha Tokomane ya Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tsa Afrika.

src_text: Tšhireletšego ya Dijo.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tokomane ya Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tsa Afrika bakeng sa Dipehelo, Keketso ya Matla Tshebetso, Taolo ya Bommasepala le Ntshetso pele ya bona ho tla tla lokiswa.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše go swarwa ka mo nageng ga Lekgotla la 2022 la Agri SA go la Pretoria ka la 13 le la 14 Diphalane 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Kgodišo ya Tšweletšo ya ka Nageng”.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa ne saene Tokomane ena ka Phato.

src_text: Lekgotla le le rerišane ka merero ya go swana le go dira gore maanakgolo temo šomele batšweletši ba ka mo nageng; mananeokgoparara go swarelela dijo tša go tšweletšwa ka mo nageng; go dira gore tikologo ya ka mo nageng tšee nako ye telele godimo ga tšweletšo ya dijo ya ka mo nageng le ka bokamosong, le go matlafatša mabokgoni tšweletšo ya dijo go diriša ditšweletšo tšeo di tšweleditšwego ka mo nageng.

Ka gona go bea pele tšhireletšego ya dijo kamoso, Kabinete amogetše go tsebagatšwa ga Hapo ya Bosetšhaba ya Tšhireletšego ya Tlhago, ka Kgoro ya Saense le Lenaneo la Kgwebišano ya Temo ya Ikonomi ya Diphedi, ka tšhomišano le Yunibesithi ya Pretoria.
tgt_text: Tokomane ena ya Keketso ya Matla Tshebetso fana ka moralo dinaheng tsohle tseo leng ditho mabapi le taba ya keketso ya tsela tsa tshebetso ho tloha boemong ba naha ho isa maemong ohle mmuso.

src_text: Hapo ye tla thekga thibelo, phokotšo le taolo ya dipuno le malwetši diphoofolo, ao tlo bago le seabe sa tšweletšo ye hlatlogetšego godimo, tšhireletšego ya dijo le tlhabollo ye swarelelago ya dinagamagae   Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: Tokomane ena shebane haholo le temana ya katoloso ya matla tshebetso maemong bommasepala le ntshetsopele ya bona..   Kopano ya Matjhaba ya bo 32 ya Selemo le Selemo ya Polokeho Ditereneng (IRSC).

src_text: Go Dumelelwa ga Tšhatha ya Kopano ya Afrika (AU) ya go Hlongwa ga Makala.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarelwa ha kopano ya bo 32 ya Selemo le Selemo ya IRSC Johannesburg ho tloha ka la 1 ho isa ka la 6 Mphalane 2023, tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re lokisa diterene tsa rona Maemong sa Lokang”.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ga Tšhatha ya AU ka Mehola le Metheo ya go Hlongwa ga Makala, Pušoselegae le Tlhabollo ya ka Nageng gore dumelelwe.
tgt_text: IRSC ke foramo ya matjhaba kopanyang ditsebi ho tsa polokeho ho tsa diterene boemong ba matjhaba ho tla hlabana malotsana ka tsa ntlafatso ya polokeho ditereneng..   Mokgatlo wa Afrika Borwa wa tsa Polokeho ho tsa Diterene ne qetele ho tshwara kopano ena ka selemo sa.

src_text: Afrika Borwa saenetše tšhatha ye ka Phato.

tgt_text: Mokgahlelo wa Bobedi wa Moralo wa Naha wa Selemo sa 2050 wa Meralo ya Motheo (NIP 2050).

src_text: Tšhatha ye ya go Hlongwa ga Makala fana ka tlhako go mebušo ka moka ye lego maloko ka sengwalwa sa tlhahlo ka khuetšo ya go hlongwa ga makala le mehola ya ona go tloga mmušong wa bosetšhaba go ya didikong tše dingwe tša mmušo.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho hatiswa ha mokgahlelo wa bobedi wa moralo wa NIP 2050 bukeng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.

src_text: Tšhatha ye swaragane kudu le phatlalatšo ya taolo le mehola, tlhako ya pušo le tlhabollo ya ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Moralo ona fana ka tataiso tabeng ya maano tshebetso le diprojeke tsa mmuso..   Moralo ona hlwaya ditshebetso tsa diprojeke lekaleng la ho dudiswa ha setjhaba, ditshebeletso tsa bommasepala tse kenyeletsang motlakase; metsi; ho thothwa ha matlakala; dipalangwang tsa setjhaba; meralo ya motheo ya tsa thuto, bophelo le dijithale le thibelo ya bobodu le bonokwane..   Moralo ona bontsha moo ho hlokahalang ho tsepamiswa maikutlo teng, le ho lekola maemo teng renang ha jwale le se tlamehang ho etswa bakeng sa ho fihlela tjhebelo pele ya moralo ona.

src_text: Khansele ya bo-32 ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Polokego ya Ditimela (IRSC).
tgt_text: Moralo ona eletsa hore tshebetso ya moralo ona be ya nako ya dilemo tse tharo.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga Kopano ya bo-32 ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya IRSC gola Johannesburg go thoma ka la 1 go fihla ka la 6 Diphalane 2023 ka fase ga morero wo: “Phetošo ya sebopego sa ditimela mo Lefaseng leo go sa tsebjego tša kamoso”.
tgt_text: Moralo wa Naha wa Ntlafatso ya Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso.

src_text: IRSC ke foramo ya boditšhabatšhaba ya go kopantšha mmogo ditsebi tša polokego ya ditimela go tšwa lefaseng ka bophara go fana maitemogelo go kaonafatša polokego ya ditimela..   Bjalo ka leloko la IRSC, Kemedi ya Afrika Borwa ya Polokego ya Ditimela swere foramo ye la mafelelo ka.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Naha wa Ntlafatso ya Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso.

src_text: Seakanywa sa Leano la Bosetšhaba sa Mananeokgoparara 2050 (NIP 2050) Kgato ya.
tgt_text: Moralo ona ne phatlalatswe ka selemo sa 2021 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba..  Moralo ona fana ka ditshiya tse hlano mabapi le ho ntlafatsa Mokgwa wa Tshebetso wa Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše phatlalatšo kuranteng ya mmušo ya Kgato ya Bobedi ya seakanywa sa NIP sa 2050 gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona.
tgt_text: Ditshiya tsena di kenyeletsa tsela ya kamohelo ya ba sa tswa hirwa Ditshebeletsong tsa Mmuso; tataiso ya mosebetsi ho ba sa tswa hirwa; meralo le ho behwa leihlo ha tsela eo basebeletsi ba sebetsang ka yona; thupello tswellang ha mmoho le menyetla ya ntlafatso ya maemo thuto..   Diphetoho dipehelong tsa kgiro ya Balaodi Kakaretso (bo DG).

src_text: Leano le le fa tlhahlo matlafatšong le kaonafatšong ya diprotšeke tše logetšwego maano tša mmušo tša mohlakanelwa..   Seakanywa se se hlaola diprotšeke tše logetšwego maano madulong batho; mohlagase wa mmasepala; meetse; dilahlwa tše thata; dinamelwa tša banamedi; thuto le mananeokgoparara maphelo; mananeokgoparara titšithale, le bosenyi le bomenetša.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tlaleho sisinyang dipehelo le boiphihlelo boo ba hirwang jwalo ka Balaodi Kakaretso Mafapheng Mmuso ba tlamehang ho ba le bona.

src_text: Sebopego sa leano le se fana ka ponelopele ya fao go swanetšego go fiwa šedi, se fana ka phetleko ya seemo sa bjale, se hlatholla dipeelano tše bohlokwa tša go atlega le go bolela gore go swanetše gore go dirwe eng go fihlelela ponelopele ye.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ena tla le ditshisinyo tse ngata tse kenyeletsang nako ya kgiro ya bo DG le tsela eo ba maemong hodimo taolo ba abang ka teng mosebetsi ho basebeletsi ba tsa ditjhelete nngwe ya ditshisinyo ke ya hore DG ofising ya Mopresidente boele be yena Hlooho ya Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba.

src_text: Se šišinya tshepedišo ya phethagatšo ye swanetšego go latelwa mo leanong la magato la go gagaba tekano ya mengwaga ye meraro.
tgt_text: Maemong diprofensi sena se tla kengwa ofising ya ditonakgolo.

src_text: Tlhako ya Phethagatšo ya Bosetšhaba ya go Fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ena boetse fana ka tataiso ya ka moo mafapha tlang ho laola ka yona ditumellano tsa kgiro tsa bo DG..   Ho boetse ho na le diphetoho ho tsela eo ho lekolwang Maemo Tshebetso bo DG hore di tsamaisane le diphetoho tse tokomaneng ena.. 4   Bekeng tlang Letona le Tshwereng Mokobobo la Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba, Ntate Thulas Nxesi tla bitsa seboka sa boraditaba ho tla phatlalatsa tsela eo Moralo wa Ntlafatso ya Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso tla kengwa tshebetsong ka teng le ho hlopholla diphetoho tse entsweng dipehelong tsa kgiro ya bo DG..   Tlaleho ya Bohlano ya Kgatelopele ya ho Kengwa Tshebetsong ha Tokomane ya Tshebetso Mabapi le Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang ya 2020-2021 (WPRPD).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Tlhako ya Phethagatšo ya Bosetšhaba ya go fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Tlaleho ya Bohlano ya Kgatelopele ya ho Kengwa Tshebetsong ha WPRPD fanang ka kgatelopele ho kengweng tshebetsong ha WPRPD.

src_text: Tlhako ye phatlaladitšwe ka 2021 gore setšhaba se ntšhe sa mafahleng sona..   Tlhako ye fana ka maikokotlelo mahlano mo magatong go hloma bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ena na le diphehiso ho tswa mafapheng naha le diprofensi kenyeletsang le kabo ya teng ya ditjhelete..   Tlaleho ya pele ne phatlalatswe ka selemo sa.

src_text: Metheo ye ya boikokotlelo akaretša kgoketšo ya pele tsena le tlhokolo mo Ditirelong tša Mmušo; kgakolo le tlwaetšo; thulaganyo le taolo ya bodiragatši; thuto ye tšwelagopele, kgatelopele ya kgetho ya mošomo le ditiragalo tša mabapi le kgetho ya mošomo.
tgt_text: Ena ya bohlano se tjhaetswe monwana hore ka hatiswa bukeng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso ke Lefapha la Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba sa Itekanelang..   Diphetoho Karolong ya bo 20(1) ya Tumellano ya ho Fokotsa Kgethollo Kgahlano le Basadi (CEDAW).

src_text: Diphetogo ka Gare ga Dipeelano tša Mošomo tša Balaodipharephare (di-DG).
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha diphetoho Karolong ya bo 20(1) ya CEDAW ho tla lokiswa.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše pego ya go šišinya magato go matlafatša mabokgoni le bokgoni bja Balaodipharephare (di-DG) Ditirelong tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Diphetoho tsena di bolela ka ho eketswa ha nako ya dikopano tsa komiti sekasekanang le ditlaleho tsa dinaha tseo leng ditho..   Afrika Borwa ne saene tumellano ena ka 1993 mme ya lokiswa ka Tshitwe.

src_text: Pego ye dirile ditšhišinyo tše mmalwa, go akaretšwa le paka ya ka kantorong ya di-DG le taolo ya baromiwa ka Lekgotlaphethiši go bahlankedi ba taolo..   Pego ye šišintše gape le gore Molaodipharephare Kantorong ya Mopresidente tla neelwa Hlogo ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Ho tliswa ha yona Palamenteng ho etsetswa hore tokomane ena kgone ho tsamaisana le diphetoho tsa Karolo ya bo 20(1) ya tumellano ena.

src_text: Kua diprofenseng, mošomo wo tla neelwa Balaodipharephare dikantorong tša Ditonakgolo.
tgt_text: Tumellano ya Matjhaba ya Kamohelo ya Mangolo Thuto Phahameng.

src_text: Pego ye šišintše gape le magato go hlahla dikgoro ka taolo ya dikontraka le Balaodipharephare.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tumellano ya Matjhaba ya Kamohelo ya Mangolo Thuto Phahameng bakeng sa tokiso.

src_text: Peakanyo ye Fetlekilwego ya Taolo ya Bodiragatši go Balaodipharephare gare ya fetlekwa gore gate ka mošito tee le diphetogo tšeo di dumeletšwego.
tgt_text: Ha se lokisitswe tla romelwa ho Matjhaba Kopaneng lekaleng la teng la Thuto, Saense le tsa Botjhaba leng se etswang ho latela Molao wa Naha Laolang Mangolo Thuto Phahameng wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 67 wa 2008).

src_text: Tona ya Motšwaoswere ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo, Ntate Thulas Nxesi tlare mo bekeng ye tlago sware kopano ya tshedimošetšo ya babegaditaba go hlatholla Tlhako ya Bosetšhaba ya Phethagatšo go fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo le gape go hlatholla gabotse diphetogo tše dumeletšwego dipeelanong tša go thwalwa ga Balaodipharephare.
tgt_text: Tumellano ena ya Matjhaba maikemisetso yona ke ho netefatsa hore ha ho kgethollo boemong ba matjhaba kamohelong ya mangolo thuto phahameng.

src_text: Pego ya Bohlano ya Mošomo ka Phethagatšo ya Sengwalwa sa Makgoraditsela ka Ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole (WPRPD) 2020-.
tgt_text: Sena se etsa hore dinaha tseo leng ditho di amohele maemo thuto dinaha tse 193 tseo leng ditho tsa Matjhaba Kopaneng.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Pego ya Bohlano ya Mošomo ka phethagatšo ya WPRPD, yeo fanago ka seemo sa bjale ka phethagatšo ya WPRPD.
tgt_text: 9  Ho tlohelwa ha diphetoho Bukaneng ya Merokotso ya Ditho tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Pego ye akaretša le ditshwayotshwayo go tšwa dikgorong tša mmušo tša bosetšhaba le tša profense fana ka seemo sa bjale ka phethagatšo ya pholisi ye akaretšago diriparipana tša ditekanyetšokabo..   Pego ya mathomo ya seemo sa mošomo ya ngwaga ka ngwaga phatlaladitšwe ka.
tgt_text: 1   Kabinete dumellane le phatlalatso ya ofisi ya Mopresidente ya ka Mantaha wa la 17 Mphalane 2022 ya ho tlohelwa ha diphetoho tse neng di entswe Bukaneng ya Merokotso ya Ditho tsa Kabinete ya.

src_text: Pego ye ya bohlano dumeletšwe go gatišwa kuranteng ya mmušo le go phatlalatšwa ke Kgoro ya Basadi, Baswa le Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole.
tgt_text: 2  Diphetoho tsena tse neng di etswe ka Mmesa 2022, di ne di eketsa merokotso diofising tsa Matona ikarabellang mafapheng fetang le le leng.

src_text: Phetošo ya Athikele ya 20(1) ya Kopano ya Phedišo ya Mehuta ka Moka ya Kgethollo Kgahlanong le Basadi (CEDAW).
tgt_text: Di ne di boetse di bolela ha mmuso tla lefella ka botlalo motlakase le metsi moo matona dulang teng.. 3  Kabinete mametse kgoeletso ya setjhaba mme ya nka qeto ya ho lekola diphetoho tsena botjha.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Phetošo ya Athikele 20(1) ya CEDAW gore dumelelwe.
tgt_text: Ho lekolwa botjha hona ho tla etswa ke komiti ikemetseng mme tlaleho ya teng tla phatlalatswa ho websaete ya Lefapha la Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso: www.dpsa.gov.za.10  Tshebedisano Diphetohong tsa ho Fokotsa ho Silafala ha Moya (JETP) ha mmoho le Moralo wa Matsete JETP, (JETP-IP).

src_text: Diphetošo tše di fana ka nako ye teletšana ya dikopano tša komiti tša go lebelela dipego tša mebušo ye lego maloko.
tgt_text: 1  Ka mora ho amohela ho phatlalatswa JETP le JETP-IP, Kabinete tjhaetse JETP-IP monwana mme ya leboha le mosebetsi wa ho hlahisa.. 2  JETP-IP hlakisa se hlokahalang ho etswa bakeng sa hore mmuso finyelle maikemisetso ona ho fokotsa ho silafala ha moya ho ka tlisa diphetoho setjhabeng le ho basebeletsi ba amehang.. 3  Komiti ya Matona ya ho Fetoha ha Maemo Lehodimo tla bitsa seboka sa boraditaba haufinyane ho tla fana ka lesedi le eketsehileng   Ditshisinyo tsa Molao.

src_text: Afrika Borwa saenetše kwano ye ka 1993 le go dumelela moragonyana ga fao ka Manthole.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Bahwebi ba Dikepeng ya Selemo sa.

src_text: Tlhagišo ye Palamenteng šetšane le go tsamaiša ka mošito tee kwano ye dumeletšwego kua morago gotee le phetošo ya Athikele 20(1) ya kwano ye.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Bahwebi ba Dikepeng wa Selemo sa 2022 ho ka sekasekwa.

src_text: Kwano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Kamogelo ya Mangwalo Thuto Mabapi le Thuto ya Godingwana.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena ntlafatsa molao wa dilemong tse 70 tse fetileng wa Bahwebi ba Dikepeng wa 1951, (Molao wa bo 57 wa 1951)..   Ha tshisinyo ena se le molao tla fana ka moralo wa taolo ya kgwebo ya dikepeng tla laola le ho ahwa, ho ngodiswa, ho rehwa mabitso le ho behellwa ha dikepe tse tsofetseng ka thoko..   Diphetoho tsena di tla tlisa diphetoho lekaleng lena la dipalangwang tsa mawatleng le ho netefatsa hore naha ena ipapisa le Ditumellano tsa Matjhaba tsa Dipalangwang tsa Mawatleng..   Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Dipalopalo wa Selemo sa.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Kwano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Kamogelo ya Mangwalo Thuto mabapi le Thuto ya Godingwana gore dumelelwe.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Ntlafatso ya Molao wa Dipalopalo wa Selemo sa 2022 ho tla sekasekwa.

src_text: Ge šetše dumeletšwe tla romelwa Mokgatlong wa Ditšhabakopano (UN) wa Thuto, Saenthefiki le tša Setšo le go kgontšhwa go šoma ka mo nageng ka Molao wa Bosetšhaba wa Tlhako ya Mangwalo Thuto, 2008 (Molao 67 wa 2008).
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena sisinya diphetoho Molaong wa Dipalopalo wa 1999 (Molao wa bo 6 wa 1999).

src_text: Kwano ye ya Lefase ka Bophara hloma metheo ya motlalanaga ya temogo ya go se tšee lehlakore le ya go se kgetholle ya mangwalo thuto ya godingwana le mangwalo thuto ka kakaretšo dumelela temogo ya mangwalo thuto dinagašele mo mebušo ye 193 ye lego maloko UN.
tgt_text: Diphetoho tsena di etswa mabapi le ho ralwa ha mmoho le ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Mokgwa wa Tshebetso wa Naha wa Dipalopalo tshehetsang ho sebediswa ha mokgwa wa dipalopalo bontshang bopaki..   Diphetoho tsena di matlafatsa tshebedisano mmoho ya Lefapha la Dipalopalo le makala mang mmuso ha mmoho le ho atolla tshebetso ya Molao ona   Diketsahalo tse tlang.

src_text: Kgogelomorago ya Diphetošo tša Tlhahli ya Maloko Komitiphethiši.
tgt_text: Seboka sa Mopresidente sa Dikgwebo tse Nyane, tse Mahareng le tse Kgolwanyane (SMME) le Mekgatlo ya Matsema.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše kwalakwatšo ye kwalakwaditšwego ke Kantoro ya Mopresidente ka Mošupologo, 17 Diphalane 2022 go gogelamorago diphetošo tšeo di dirilwego go Tlhahli ya Maloko Komitiphethiši, yeo bitšwago Pukukgakollo ya Ditona, ya..   Diphetošo tše di dirilwego ka Moranang 2022 di fane ka thekgo ya tlaleletšo go tše dingwe tša dikantoro tša Ditona tšeo di rwelego maikarabelo lefapha la go feta le tee.
tgt_text: Lefapha la Ntshetsopele ya Dikgwebo tse Nyane ka kopanelo le lekala le ikemetseng ba tla tshwara Seboka sa Naha sa Mopresidente sa di-SMME le Mekgatlo ya Matsema mane Bryanston, Gauteng ho tloha ka la 13 ho ya ka la 15 Pudungwana.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di be di nyaka gore Mmušo rwale maikarabelo ka botlalo disenyegelo tša go amana le kabo ya mohlagase le meetse madulong semmušo go dulwa ke maloko komitiphethiši..   Kabinete lemogile dipelaelo tšeo di hlagišitšwego ke maloko setšhaba ebile tšeere sephetho sa go sekaseka Tlhahli ya Maloko Komitiphethiši.

Tshepedišo ye šogašogwa ke setheo sa go se tšee lehlakore ebile ge fihlile mafelelong, tlhahli ye tlo phatlalatšwa setšhabeng ka wepsaete ye ya Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo: www.dpsa.gov.za.
tgt_text: Seboka sena se tla kopanya ditsebi ho tswa ho mmuso le lekaleng le ikemetseng ho tla bontshana ka tsela tsa ntlafatso lekaleng lena.

src_text: Kgwerano Diphetogong tša Enetši tša go se Tšee Lehlakore (JETP) le Leano la Dipeeletšo la JETP (JETP-IP).
tgt_text: Hara ba lebeletsweng ke mekgatlo ya dikgwebo, ba sebetsang ka di-SMME, barutehi, bangodi ba melawana le ba mekgatlo ya tshehetso ya ditjhelete..   Sebokeng sena ho tla boela ho sekasekwe Moralo wa Kopanelo wa Ntshetsopele ya Dikgwebo tse Nyane oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng ho matlafatsa lekala lena la di-SMME.

src_text: Ka morago ga go amogela tlhagišo ka JETP le JETP-IP, Kabinete thekgile ka atla pedi ETP-IP le go laetša ka fao kgotsofetšego ka gona ka mošomo wa go tsenelela wo dirilwego go kaonafatša..   JETP-IP hlatholla dipeeletšo tšeo di nyakegago go fihlelela maikgafo go fediša khabone ao dirilwego ke Mmušo wa Afrika Borwa mola ka go le lengwe go hlohleletšwa tlhabollo ya go swarelela nako ye teletšana, le go netefatša gore go fihlelelwa diphetogo tša go se tšee lehlakore go bašomedi bao ba amegago le setšhaba..   Komiti ya Magareng ga Ditona ka Phetogo ya Klaemete tlare go se goye kae ya swara tshedimošetšo le babegaditaba go fana ka tshedimošo ka botlalo   Melaokakanywa.
tgt_text: Seboka sena hape ho lebeletswe hore se thakgole le taba ya Dikgau tsa Selemo le Selemo tsa Mopresidente tsa di-SMME..   Seboka sa Mopresidente sa Twantsho tsa Tlhekefetso ya Basadi le Dipolao tsa Bona (GBVF) sa Selemo sa.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wa 2022 wa Dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi.
tgt_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla tshwara Seboka sa bobedi sa GBVF mane Gallagher Convention Centre, Gauteng ka la 1 le la 2 Pudungwana.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Molaokakanywa wa 2022 wa Dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi gore lebelelwe goya pele.
tgt_text: Seboka sa pele se ne se tshwarwe ka selemo sa 2018 seo ho sona mmuso le mekgatlo ya setjhaba ba neng ba etse boinehelo ba ho fokotsa ditlhekefetso tsena naheng ena..   Seboka sena sa bobedi ka sona ho tla shejwa tema seng kgathilwe ho kenyeng tshebetsong Moralo wa Naha wa GBVF.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo mpshafatša Molao wa Dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi wa go ba le mengwaga ye 70 ka bogolo, 1951 (Molao 57 wa 1951).
tgt_text: Lepetjo la selemong sena le tla re: “Re Tiisa Boikarabelo, ho Patlakiswa le ho Matlafatswa HONA JWALE”..   Seboka sena se tla buisana ka taba tse kenyeletsang boikarabelo mafapheng ikarabellang ha mmoho le bankakarolo ba kang mekgatlo ya setjhaba, lekala le ikemetseng le ya basebetsi..   Imbizo ya Bohlano ya Mopresidente leba Kapa Leboya.

src_text: Ge šetše dumeletšwe, Molaokakanywa wo tlo fana ka tlhako ya semolao ya dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi go laola magatokamano dikepe.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Bohlano ya Mopresidente ya Ntlafatso ya Ditereke (DDM) tlo tshwarelwa Upington, Kapa Leboya ka Labohlano la la 21 Mphalane 2022 lebaleng la dipapadi la Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs..   Imbizo ena ya Mopresidente ya DDM tlo lekola kgatelo pele le diphephetso tse teng phanong ya ditshebeletso Kapa Leboya mme ho be le mekgwa ya tharollo.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo, magareng ga tše dingwe tla laola tlhamo, boingwadišo, go rea maina le go ntšhwa ga dikepe.
tgt_text: DDM netefatsa ho potlakiswa ha moralo wa phano ya ditshebeletso, ho kengwa ha lona tshebetsong ha mmoho le kabo ya teng ya ditjhelete..   Pele ho imbizo ena, matona, ditho tsa moifo wa bommasepala le boramotse ba tla tshwara mananeo fapafapaneng sebakeng seo sa Upington..   Tlaleho ya Hara Selemo ya Kabo ya Matlotlo (MTBPS).

src_text: Diphetošo tše di tlo ba le seabe tsošološong ya lefapha la dinamelwa tša mabopong le go tsamaiša naga ye ka mošito tee le Kwano ya Mokgatlo wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa tša Mabopo.
tgt_text: Kabinete kgolwa hore ho fana ka MTBPS ya selemo sa 2022 ke Letona la Matlotlo Enoch Godongwana ka Laboraro la la 26 Mphalane 2022, ke karolo ya mehato ya bohlokwa ya ho beha tsohle pepeneng ha re tla kabong ya matlotlo..   MTBPS fana ka tlaleho ya boinehelo ba mmuso ba ho bontsha ka moo matlotlo naha sebediswang ka teng boetse bontsha le ka moo mmuso tlang ho leka ho fokotsa sekgeo pakeng tsa tjhelete kenang le sebediswang..   Ditlhahlobo tsa Sehlopha sa Leshome.

src_text: Afrika Borwa dumeletše kwano ye.
tgt_text: Ditlhahlobo tsa Makgaolakgang tsa Sehlopha sa Leshome tsa selemo sa 2022 di tlo qala ka la 31 Mphalane mme di fele ka la 7 Tshitwe.

src_text: Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2020 wa Dipalopalo.
tgt_text: Kabinete lakaletsa baithuti bana ba Selemo sa 2022 mahlohonolo ditlhahlobong tsa bona.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2022 gore lebelelwe goya pele.
tgt_text: Tshehetso ya matitjhere, batswadi le bahlokomedi tla thusa baithuti bana ho shebana le ditlhahlobo tsa bona ka boitshepo..   Kabinete etsa kgoeletso ho batswadi le bahlokomedi ho kgothatsa le ho thusa bana hore ba kgone ho ithuta hantle malapeng..   Seboka sa Moralo wa Naha wa Ntsetsopele (NDP) le Bokgoni ba Mmuso.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo šišinya phetošo ya Molao wa Dipalopalo, 1999 (Molao 6 wa 1999).
tgt_text: Lefapha la Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba ka kopanelo le Komeshene ya Naha ya Meralo ka tshebedisano mmoho le lekala la Ntshetsopele Yunivesithing ya Kwa Zulu-Natal di tla tshwara seboka sa NDP le Bokgoni ba Mmuso ho tloha ka la 7 ho ya ho la 9 Pudungwana 2022 lekaleng la Howard College la Yunivesithi ena ya KwaZulu-Natal..   Seboka sena se tla hlahloba bokgoni ba mmuso le tshebetso ya ona dilemong tse leshome tsa pele tsa NDP.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di fana ka tlhabollo le phethagatšo ya Peakanyo ya Bosetšhaba ya Dipalopalo yeo thekgago diphetho tša go ba le bohlatse..   Di matlafatša tšhomišano ye lego gona magareng ga Dipalopalo tša Afrika Borwa le ditho tše dingwe tša mmušo, ebile di nabiša tlhako ya taolo ya Molao wo   Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.
tgt_text: Lepetjo la seboka sena ke le reng: “Re Lekola Tshebetso le Bokgoni ba Mmuso Dilemong tse Leshome tsa NDP”.

src_text: Samiti ya Bosetšhaba ya Lesolo la Mopresidente ka Dikgwebopotlana, tše Nnyane le tša Magareng (di-SMME) le Dikoporasi.
tgt_text: Ho Nehelanwa ka Lengolo la Bopaki ba Borena ho Morena Misuzulu KaZwelithini.

src_text: Kgoro ya Tlhabollo ya Dikgwebo tše Nnyane, ka kgwebišano le bakgathatema ba lefapha la praebete tla swara Samiti ya Bosetšhaba ya Lesolo la Mopresidente ka Dikgwebopotlana, tše Nnyane le tša Magareng (di-SMME) le Dikoporasi gola Bryanston, Gauteng go tloga ka la 13 go fihla ka la 15 Dibatsela..   Samiti ye tla kopantšha mmogo bakgathatema ba bohlokwa ba praebete le ba lekala la mmušo ka gare ga peakanyo ya dikgwebo tše nnyane, go rerišana ka go hwetša ditsela tša go šomišana mmogo go matlafatša lefapha le.
tgt_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fana ka Lengolo la Bopaki ba Borena ho Morena Misuzulu KaZwelithini mane Lebaleng la Dipapadi la Moses Mabhida, Thekong, ka Moqebelo wa la 29 Mphalane..   Mokete ona latela wa setso bitswang “Ukungena eSibayeni” neng tshwarwe ka la 20 Phato 2022 neng paka ho nka ha hae setulo sa borena ba setjhaba sa Mazulu   MelaetsaDitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: Ntate Sam Matekane, ya thonyeditsweng ho ba Tonakgolo ya Mmuso wa Lesotho.

src_text: Bakgathatema bao ba letetšwego ba akaretša lekgotla la dikgwebo, ditsebi tša di-SMME, bahlami ba dipholisi le ditheo tša tlhabollo ya ditšhelete.
tgt_text: Kabinete boetse ikopanya le Moifo wa Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tsa Afrika neng Behile Dikgetho tsa Palamenteng ya Lesotho ka la 7 Mphalane 2022 leihlo, mme thoholetsa naha eo ka botsitso ba yona ho tsa dipolotiki ka ho tshwara dikgetho tseo ka katleho.

src_text: Samiti ye tla rerišana le ka Leanolegolo la Bosetšhaba la Mohlakanelwa la Dikgwebo tše Nnyane, leo le fanago ka tlhako ye logetšwego maano ya go matlafatša lefapha la di-SMME.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa ntse ikemiseditse ho tiisa maqhama yona tshebedisano le dinaha tsa sedika, kontinete ha mmoho le tsa matjhaba..   MatshedisoKabinete fetisetsa matshediso yona ho malapa le metswalle ya: Ntate Fatere Albert Nolan (88), Moprista ya neng inehetse haholo wa Afrika Borwa wa Kereke Katolike ya neng sa tshabe ho hlahisa maikutlo hae ka tsa tumelo nakong ya kgethollo ya mmala.

src_text: Samiti ye go letetšwe gape gore tsebagatše Difoka tša Ngwaga ka Ngwaga tša Bosetšhaba tša Mopresidente tša di-SMME.
tgt_text: Ka selemo sa 2003, Mopresidente wa ka nako eo Thabo Mbeki ne mo tlotle ka Kgau ya Silivera ya Order of Luthuli ka kabelo ya hae ntweng ya demokrasi ya naha ena le ho lwanela toka le ditokelo tsa botho nakong ya kgethollo ya mmala”   Kgiro.

src_text: Go Swarwa ga Samiti ya bo-2022 ya Dikgaruru tša go Ikala ka Bong le Polao ya Basadi.
tgt_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang   Moatevokate James Mlawu – Molaodi Kakaretso, Lefapheng la Dipalangwang   Ntate Shabeer Khan – Motsamaise Moholo wa Ditjhelete: Lefapheng la Matlotlo.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla swara Samiti ya Bobedi ya Mopresidente ya GBVF kua Sentharengkgoparara ya Gallagher gola Gauteng ka la 1 le la 2 Dibatsela.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumellana le ho hirwa ha batho ba latelang:.

src_text: Samiti ya mathomo ye bego swerwe ka 2018 šomišitšwe go itlama ka boswa ga mmušo le bagwebišani ba leago go fediša ditiragalo tše lego godimo tša dikgaruru kgahlanong le basadi ka mo nageng..   Samiti ya bobedi tla šomišwa go sekaseka pele kgatelopele ye fihleletšwego ya Leano la Bosetšhaba le Logetšwego Maano ka GBVF.
tgt_text: Ditho tsa Boto ya Afrika Borwa ya tsa Bohahlaudi   Ngaka Nondumiso Maphazi (Modula Setulo)   Ngaka Aubrey Mhlongo (Motlatsi wa Modula Setulo)   Mme Pretty Ntombela   Mme Nomahlubi Mazwai   Ntate Odwa Mtati   Ntate Ravi Nadasen kgethilwe hape)   Ntate Enver Duminy kgethilwe hape)   Mme Nandipha Mzileni Mbulawa   Ntate Mduduzi Zakwe kgethilwe hape)   Mme Rosemary Anderson   Mme Lehlohonolo Rapodile; lel.

src_text: Yona tlo swarwa ka fase ga morero wo: “Boikarabelo, Potlakišo le Tlaleletšo GONA BJALE”..   Samiti ye tla rerišana ka, magareng ga tše dingwe, go hwetša mekgwa ya go potlakiša magato le boikarabelo go tšwa dikgorong tše bohlokwa le bakgathatema ka moka ba go akaretša mekgatlo ye lego setšhabeng, lefapha la praebete le bašomi..   Imbizo ya Bohlano ya Mopresidente kua Kapa Leboa.
tgt_text: Mme Nonkqubela Silulwane (Moemedi wa Lefapha).

src_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Mmotlolo wa Bohlano wa Tlhabollo ya Dilete (DDM) go la Upington, Kapa Leboa tla phethagala ka Labohlano, 21 Diphalane 2022 Lepatlelong la fao la Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs Stadium..   Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya DDM tlo sekaseka kgatelopele ya kabo ya ditirelo le ditlhotlo tša kua Kapa Leboa le go tsena seemo seo ka bogare go rarolla ditlhotlo tšeo.
tgt_text: Ditho tsa Boto ya Koporasi ya Taolo ya Mebila   Ngaka Eddie Mogalefi Thebe kgethilwe hape)   Mme Thandi Clara Thankge kgethilwe hape)   Moprofesara Maredi Mphahlele   Mme Nomusa Mufamadi (Modulasetulo)   Moatevokate Xola Stemela   Mme Lerato Magalo   Moprofesara Chitja Twala   Ntate Nkumeleni John Kudzingana   Mme Jaxa (Setho sa keketso); le   Mme HM Mbanyele-Ntshinga (Setho sa keketso).

src_text: DDM netefatša gore thulaganyo ya kabo ya ditirelo, phethagatšo le bolekanyetši ba monwana le lenala go kaonafatša kabo ya ditirelo bathong..   Ka gona go itokišetša Imbizo ye, Ditona, maloko makgotlaphethiši le dimeyara ba tlo tsenela ditiragalo tša go fihlelela setšhaba ka gare ga Upington le go potologa..   Pego ya Pholisi ya Tekanyetšokabo ya Paka ya Magareng (MTBPS).
tgt_text: Ntate Tshepo Monaheng – Motsamaisi ya ka Sehloohong (CEO): Khamphane ya Naha ya Meru (Tumellano ya kgiro ekeditswe ka dilemo tse tharo.

src_text: Kabinete dumela gore MTBPS ya 2022 yeo tlo hlagišwago ke Tona ya Ditšhelete Enoch Godongwana ka Laboraro, 26 Diphalane 2022 ke karolo ye bohlokwa ya tshepedišo ya phatlalatša le ya boikarabelo ya bolekanyetši..   MTBPS ke mokgwa wa go phethagatša maikgafo mmušo ntle le go fetiša magomokakaretšo disenyegelo ao mmušo ka kgonang hlatholla goya pele ka fao mmušo tla netefatšago gore disenyegelo ga di fete letseno, le go dira tše ntši ka didirišwa tše lego gona..   Ditlhahlobo tša Marematlou.
tgt_text: Ntate Reginald Lavhelesani Demana – CEO: Mokgatlo wa Naha wa Afrika Borwa wa Taolo ya Mebila..   Mme Ditebogo Kgomo – CEO: Taolo ya Naha ya Nuclear.

src_text: Ditlhahlobo tša 2022 tša Bosetšhaba tša Mphato wa Marematlou di thoma ka la 31 Diphalane le go fela ka la 7 Manthole.
tgt_text: Ntate Risenga Maluleka – Radipalopalo Moholo (Tumellano ya kgiro ekeditswe).

src_text: Kabinete lakaletša Barutwana ba Marematlou ba 2022 mahlatse le mahlogonolo ge ba le gare ba tsena kgatong ya mafelelofelelo ya leeto la dithuto tša bona.
tgt_text: Mme Kedibone Olga Madiehe – CEO: Mokgatlo wa Taolo ya Penshene ya Basebeletsi ba Mmuso.

src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Issues in the environment.

src_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).
tgt_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.

src_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..
tgt_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..

src_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..
tgt_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..

src_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.
tgt_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.

src_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.
tgt_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.

src_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..
tgt_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..

src_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..
tgt_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..

src_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.
tgt_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.

src_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.

src_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.
tgt_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.

src_text: Safety and security .
tgt_text: Safety and security .

src_text: Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS) – which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force – has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.
tgt_text: Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS) – which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force – has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.

src_text: Through NATJOINTS, the security of the country is assessed regularly for any possible security threat.
tgt_text: Through NATJOINTS, the security of the country is assessed regularly for any possible security threat.

src_text: As part of the cooperation agreements with other intelligence agencies from other countries, South Africa also benefits from the exchange of relevant intelligence information that can ensure the safety of the nation..
tgt_text: As part of the cooperation agreements with other intelligence agencies from other countries, South Africa also benefits from the exchange of relevant intelligence information that can ensure the safety of the nation..

src_text: Cabinet calls on the public to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious and illegal activities to law enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on the public to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious and illegal activities to law enforcement agencies.

src_text: Do not keep quiet; if you see something, say something – together we can keep the nation safe.
tgt_text: Do not keep quiet; if you see something, say something – together we can keep the nation safe.

src_text: 2022 Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS).
tgt_text: 2022 Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the bold measures introduced in the 2022 MTBPS to restore the health of our public finances, just as the world economy is taking dangerous turn for the worse..
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the bold measures introduced in the 2022 MTBPS to restore the health of our public finances, just as the world economy is taking dangerous turn for the worse..

src_text: The steps announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Parliament, Cape Town on Wednesday, 26 October 2022, included narrowing our budget deficit greatly to improve our fiscal framework, support our economic standing and give South Africans every confidence in the future prospects of our economy.
tgt_text: The steps announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Parliament, Cape Town on Wednesday, 26 October 2022, included narrowing our budget deficit greatly to improve our fiscal framework, support our economic standing and give South Africans every confidence in the future prospects of our economy.

src_text: The planned increase in contingency reserves allows us to deal with emergencies such as natural disasters.
tgt_text: The planned increase in contingency reserves allows us to deal with emergencies such as natural disasters.

src_text: The 2022 MTBPS further boosts our key priorities of infrastructure and service-delivery programmes, and provides additional relief to support the poor and vulnerable in our nation..
tgt_text: The 2022 MTBPS further boosts our key priorities of infrastructure and service-delivery programmes, and provides additional relief to support the poor and vulnerable in our nation..

src_text: Cabinet calls on all socio-economic sectors to partner with the government to uplift our economy to improve the lives of our citizens across the country.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on all socio-economic sectors to partner with the government to uplift our economy to improve the lives of our citizens across the country.

src_text: South Africa – Spain relations.
tgt_text: South Africa – Spain relations.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcome of the Official Visit to South Africa by Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón of Spain to solidify the already strong relations between the two countries.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcome of the Official Visit to South Africa by Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón of Spain to solidify the already strong relations between the two countries.

src_text: The Prime Minister was accompanied by the Spanish Minister for Industry, Trade and Tourism, Ms Reyes Maroto, and business delegation.
tgt_text: The Prime Minister was accompanied by the Spanish Minister for Industry, Trade and Tourism, Ms Reyes Maroto, and business delegation.

src_text: The visit created opportunities for various South African sectors to meet with their Spanish counterparts and to deepen cooperation in trade and investment, science and innovation, arts and culture, sports and education.
tgt_text: The visit created opportunities for various South African sectors to meet with their Spanish counterparts and to deepen cooperation in trade and investment, science and innovation, arts and culture, sports and education.

src_text: This visit provided another boost to the country’s investment and economic growth drive.
tgt_text: This visit provided another boost to the country’s investment and economic growth drive.

src_text: Ethiopia – Tigray Peace Talks.
tgt_text: Ethiopia – Tigray Peace Talks.

src_text: South Africa, under the auspices of the African Union, hosted formal peace talks between the warring sides in the conflict in Ethiopia's Tigray region, from 25 to 30 October.
tgt_text: South Africa, under the auspices of the African Union, hosted formal peace talks between the warring sides in the conflict in Ethiopia's Tigray region, from 25 to 30 October.

src_text: The dialogue was facilitated by Nigeria’s former President Olusegun Obasanjo, Kenya's former President Uhuru Kenyatta and South Africa's former Deputy President Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka.
tgt_text: The dialogue was facilitated by Nigeria’s former President Olusegun Obasanjo, Kenya's former President Uhuru Kenyatta and South Africa's former Deputy President Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka.

src_text: Cabinet expressed its support for peaceful and sustainable solution to the conflict, in line with South Africa’s foreign policy objectives of secure and conflict-free continent   Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: Cabinet expressed its support for peaceful and sustainable solution to the conflict, in line with South Africa’s foreign policy objectives of secure and conflict-free continent   Cabinet Decisions.

src_text: National Integrated Small Enterprise Development (NISED) Strategic Framework.
tgt_text: National Integrated Small Enterprise Development (NISED) Strategic Framework.

src_text: Cabinet approved the NISED Strategic Framework for implementation.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the NISED Strategic Framework for implementation.

src_text: The initial Integrated Strategy for the Promotion of Entrepreneurship and Small Enterprises (ISPESE) was adopted in.
tgt_text: The initial Integrated Strategy for the Promotion of Entrepreneurship and Small Enterprises (ISPESE) was adopted in.

src_text: The ISPESE and the subsequent NISED give effect to the 1995 White Paper on the National Strategy for the Development and Promotion of Small Business in South Africa.
tgt_text: The ISPESE and the subsequent NISED give effect to the 1995 White Paper on the National Strategy for the Development and Promotion of Small Business in South Africa.

src_text: The NISED Strategic Framework provides an integrated strategy to strengthen and support entrepreneurship for small and medium-sized enterprises.
tgt_text: The NISED Strategic Framework provides an integrated strategy to strengthen and support entrepreneurship for small and medium-sized enterprises.

src_text: It provides structured coordination framework for all key ecosystem role players in small to medium enterprise development.
tgt_text: It provides structured coordination framework for all key ecosystem role players in small to medium enterprise development.

src_text: In April this year, Cabinet approved the publication of the draft NISED strategic framework for public comment.
tgt_text: In April this year, Cabinet approved the publication of the draft NISED strategic framework for public comment.

src_text: Through the wide consultations, the strategy was enhanced by inputs from the public and from the National Economic Development and Labour Council, which is forum comprising business, civil society, labour, academics and government that seeks to deal with economic, labour and development issues and related challenges facing the country.
tgt_text: Through the wide consultations, the strategy was enhanced by inputs from the public and from the National Economic Development and Labour Council, which is forum comprising business, civil society, labour, academics and government that seeks to deal with economic, labour and development issues and related challenges facing the country.

src_text: Draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publishing for public comment of the draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the publishing for public comment of the draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.

src_text: The policy gives effect to the White Paper on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and the United Nations (UN) Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (UNCPRD).
tgt_text: The policy gives effect to the White Paper on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and the United Nations (UN) Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (UNCPRD).

src_text: The policy guides the Department of Social Development in the provision of its services to persons with disabilities and their respective families.
tgt_text: The policy guides the Department of Social Development in the provision of its services to persons with disabilities and their respective families.

src_text: It outlines the restrictive environment and barriers that continue to marginalise and exclude persons with disabilities from mainstream society, and from participating in social and economic activities.
tgt_text: It outlines the restrictive environment and barriers that continue to marginalise and exclude persons with disabilities from mainstream society, and from participating in social and economic activities.

src_text: It proposes monitoring mechanisms that will ensure closer tracking of its implementation and mainstream interventions within the relevant departments.
tgt_text: It proposes monitoring mechanisms that will ensure closer tracking of its implementation and mainstream interventions within the relevant departments.

src_text: South Africa is signatory to the UNCPRD and the African Charter on Human and People’s Rights on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Africa..   Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Meeting.
tgt_text: South Africa is signatory to the UNCPRD and the African Charter on Human and People’s Rights on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Africa..   Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Meeting.

src_text: The IPCC Bureau will be convening its seventh assessment cycle meeting in June.
tgt_text: The IPCC Bureau will be convening its seventh assessment cycle meeting in June.

src_text: The IPCC – which comprises panel of 195-member governments under the UN – is responsible for assessing the available scientific, technical and socio-economic knowledge, so as to advise decision-makers about the causes, impacts and responses to climate change.
tgt_text: The IPCC – which comprises panel of 195-member governments under the UN – is responsible for assessing the available scientific, technical and socio-economic knowledge, so as to advise decision-makers about the causes, impacts and responses to climate change.

src_text: During its meeting in 2023, the IPCC is expected to elect new chairperson for its seventh assessment cycle.
tgt_text: During its meeting in 2023, the IPCC is expected to elect new chairperson for its seventh assessment cycle.

src_text: Cabinet has endorsed the nomination of Prof Debra Roberts from the University of KwaZulu-Natal for this position.
tgt_text: Cabinet has endorsed the nomination of Prof Debra Roberts from the University of KwaZulu-Natal for this position.

src_text: Prof Roberts has championed increased IPCC outreach work in Africa.
tgt_text: Prof Roberts has championed increased IPCC outreach work in Africa.

src_text: She is currently member of the IPCC Bureau.
tgt_text: She is currently member of the IPCC Bureau.

src_text: If elected she would be the first woman and person from Africa to chair this body.
tgt_text: If elected she would be the first woman and person from Africa to chair this body.

src_text: Her election will send positive message on the good work being done by female scientists from Africa  Upcoming events.
tgt_text: Her election will send positive message on the good work being done by female scientists from Africa  Upcoming events.

src_text: 2022 16 Days of Activism Campaign.
tgt_text: 2022 16 Days of Activism Campaign.

src_text: South Africa will join the world in participating in the annual 16 Days of Activism against GBV, which kicks off on 25 November, the International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women, and runs until 10 December, Human Rights Day.
tgt_text: South Africa will join the world in participating in the annual 16 Days of Activism against GBV, which kicks off on 25 November, the International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women, and runs until 10 December, Human Rights Day.

src_text: Cabinet approved this year’s concept and the theme as “Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment to build women’s resilience against Gender-based violence and Femicide: Connect, Collaborate, Contract”.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved this year’s concept and the theme as “Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment to build women’s resilience against Gender-based violence and Femicide: Connect, Collaborate, Contract”.

src_text: During the 16 Days of Activism for No Violence against Women and Children this year, South Africa will focus its awareness activities on the implementation of the NSP on GBVF.
tgt_text: During the 16 Days of Activism for No Violence against Women and Children this year, South Africa will focus its awareness activities on the implementation of the NSP on GBVF.

src_text: The plan aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and the country as whole.
tgt_text: The plan aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and the country as whole.

src_text: Disability Rights Awareness Month (DRAM) and National Day of Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Disability Rights Awareness Month (DRAM) and National Day of Persons with Disabilities.

src_text: Cabinet approved the concept and the theme for the 2022 DRAM and National Day of Persons with Disabilities, which runs from 3 November to 3 December.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the concept and the theme for the 2022 DRAM and National Day of Persons with Disabilities, which runs from 3 November to 3 December.

src_text: The theme is: “Empowering Persons with Disabilities through resourceful, sustainable and safe environments”..
tgt_text: The theme is: “Empowering Persons with Disabilities through resourceful, sustainable and safe environments”..

src_text: The theme emphasises the importance of resolving existing barriers affecting people with disabilities.
tgt_text: The theme emphasises the importance of resolving existing barriers affecting people with disabilities.

src_text: This includes ensuring resourceful, sustainable and safe environments for persons with disabilities, and also recognising that not all disabilities are visible.
tgt_text: This includes ensuring resourceful, sustainable and safe environments for persons with disabilities, and also recognising that not all disabilities are visible.

src_text: The month-long activities will raise awareness and also showcase the progress the country has made in ensuring the protection of the rights of persons with disabilities, as enshrined in the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of.
tgt_text: The month-long activities will raise awareness and also showcase the progress the country has made in ensuring the protection of the rights of persons with disabilities, as enshrined in the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of.

src_text: The activities will also highlight the need to address challenges experienced by persons with disabilities in the workplace and society   Messages.
tgt_text: The activities will also highlight the need to address challenges experienced by persons with disabilities in the workplace and society   Messages.
